${ModID}:Guppy.NAME: Guppy
${ModID}:Guppy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hammerhead.NAME: Hammerhead
${ModID}:Hammerhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Piranha.NAME: Piranha
${ModID}:Piranha.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Qwilfish.NAME: Qwilfish
${ModID}:Qwilfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SeaMonster.NAME: Sea Monster
${ModID}:SeaMonster.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Attacks into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:SeaMonster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Upgraded Attacks into your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn and gain Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Shark.NAME: Shark
${ModID}:Shark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Starfish.NAME: Starfish
${ModID}:Starfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CastLine.NAME: Cast Line
${ModID}:CastLine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! ${ModID}:Fish on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:SetSail.NAME: Set Sail
${ModID}:SetSail.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 Attack. NL It costs 0 until played. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${ModID}:MopUp.NAME: Mop Up
${ModID}:MopUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL If it's a Curse or Status, gain [E] and draw a card.

${ModID}:ThatsAllFolks.NAME: That's All, Folks!
${ModID}:ThatsAllFolks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Solo: Deal !D! damage again and draw 1 card.

${ModID}:Wander.NAME: Wander
${ModID}:Wander.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard your hand, then draw !M! card.
${ModID}:Wander.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard your hand, then draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:BagOfDefends.NAME: Bag of Defends
${ModID}:BagOfDefends.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL When you remove a Defend from your deck, Upgrade this.

${ModID}:Oblivious.NAME: Oblivious
${ModID}:Oblivious.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 ${ModID}:Fish into your hand.
${ModID}:Oblivious.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 Upgraded ${ModID}:Fish into your hand.

${ModID}:RodSlam.NAME: Rod Slam
${ModID}:RodSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw 1 fewer card.

${ModID}:NostalgicStrike.NAME: Nostalgic Strike
${ModID}:NostalgicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return the rarest card in your discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:FutureProofing.NAME: Future Proofing
${ModID}:FutureProofing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Scry !M!. NL Upgrade the top card of your draw pile this combat.

${ModID}:CardboardBullets.NAME: Cardboard Bullets
${ModID}:CardboardBullets.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the total cost of cards in your hand. NL Cost X cards count as 4.
${ModID}:CardboardBullets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the total cost of cards in your hand + 3. NL Cost X cards count as 4.

${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.NAME: Feeding Frenzy
${ModID}:FeedingFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Fish in your draw pile, discard pile, or hand.

${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.NAME: Catch of the Day
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.
${ModID}:CatchOfTheDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle a ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Baited.NAME: Baited
${ModID}:Baited.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, add !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your hand.

${ModID}:AllOut.NAME: All Out
${ModID}:AllOut.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if your hand is empty, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:GarlicClove.NAME: Garlic Clove
${ModID}:GarlicClove.DESCRIPTION: Remove your Weak and Vulnerable. NL If you're not a Vampire, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RingTheBell.NAME: Ring the Bell
${ModID}:RingTheBell.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 13 HP. NL Put a *Curse *of *the *Bell on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Bobber.NAME: Bobber
${ModID}:Bobber.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If you draw this after your turn starts, gain !${ModID}:m2! Block and !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Surprise.NAME: Surprise!
${ModID}:Surprise.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. When this card is drawn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:WakaWaka.NAME: Waka Waka
${ModID}:WakaWaka.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: Shuffle 2 *Power *Pellets into your draw pile.
${ModID}:WakaWaka.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: Shuffle 2 *Power *Pellets into your draw pile.

${ModID}:PowerPellet.NAME: Power Pellet
${ModID}:PowerPellet.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of *Waka *Wakas by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cannoneer.NAME: Cannoneer
${ModID}:Cannoneer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.NAME: Discover a Crate
${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Smite and a *Safety into your hand. ${ModID}:Voyaged: Upgrade them. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:DiscoverACrate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Smite and a *Safety into your hand. ${ModID}:Voyaged: Upgrade them.

${ModID}:TreasureChest.NAME: Treasure Chest
${ModID}:TreasureChest.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! *Gold. NL Put 1 ${ModID}:Fish on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Whaling.NAME: Whaling
${ModID}:Whaling.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL If you have over 200 *Gold, spend !${ModID}:m2! to gain an extra 1 Strength.

${ModID}:Reserves.NAME: Reserves
${ModID}:Reserves.DESCRIPTION: After you play a cost X card, gain [E].

${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.NAME: X Marks the Spot
${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.DESCRIPTION: Add a random cost X card from another class into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:XMarksTheSpot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random cost X card from another class into your hand. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Splash.NAME: Splash
${ModID}:Splash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL This card's damage and Block are reduced by 2 for each other card in your hand.

${ModID}:DeckedOut.NAME: Decked Out
${ModID}:DeckedOut.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If you're on Steam Deck, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ShipRam.NAME: Ship Ram
${ModID}:ShipRam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Voyaged: Deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:FlamingFlip.NAME: Flaming Flip
${ModID}:FlamingFlip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 1 card at random. NL Draw 2 cards.

${ModID}:BoxOfHavoc.NAME: Box of Havoc
${ModID}:BoxOfHavoc.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:m2! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Solo: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies instead.

${ModID}:Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
${ModID}:Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your Block is broken this turn, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:Lie.NAME: Lie
${ModID}:Lie.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Add a *Cheat into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Lie.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Add a *Cheat+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Cheat.NAME: Cheat
${ModID}:Cheat.DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Steal into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Cheat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Steal+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${ModID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has positive Strength, steal up to !M! of it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SetupButBetter.NAME: Setup but Better
${ModID}:SetupButBetter.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

${ModID}:RatedX.NAME: Rated X
${ModID}:RatedX.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL X >= 1: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL X >= 2: Gain !B! Block. NL X >= 4: Gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.NAME: It Was THIIIIIIIS Big!
${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.DESCRIPTION: Triple the effects of ALL current ${ModID}:Fish cards. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ItWasTHIIIIIIISBig.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Quadruple the effects of ALL current ${ModID}:Fish cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GoneFishing.NAME: Gone Fishing
${ModID}:GoneFishing.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChocolateChipCookie.NAME: Chocolate Chip Cookie
${ModID}:ChocolateChipCookie.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity. NL Upgrade all cards in your hand this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AnglerForm.NAME: Angler Form
${ModID}:AnglerForm.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you play a card each turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
${ModID}:FullHouse.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. NL Shuffle !M! copies into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Fishbones.NAME: Fishbones
${ModID}:Fishbones.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each card in the Exhaust pile.

${ModID}:PickMe.NAME: Pick Me!
${ModID}:PickMe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL When this appears in a card reward, the other cards are Upgraded.

${ModID}:Hook.NAME: Hook
${ModID}:Hook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! ${ModID}:Fish into your draw pile.

${ModID}:RidiculousFishing.NAME: Ridiculous Fishing
${ModID}:RidiculousFishing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Colorless card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Concentrated.NAME: Caffeinated
${ModID}:Concentrated.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].
${ModID}:Concentrated.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:PlantFlag.NAME: Plant Flag
${ModID}:PlantFlag.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Flag on top of your draw pile.
${ModID}:PlantFlag.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Flag+ on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Flag.NAME: Flag
${ModID}:Flag.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RodOfHope.NAME: Rod of Hope
${ModID}:RodOfHope.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Voyaged: Put !M! ${ModID}:Foil *Star *Shards on top of your draw pile and Exhaust this.

${ModID}:Maw.NAME: Maw
${ModID}:Maw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Eel.NAME: Eel
${ModID}:Eel.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Eel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FinishingTouches.NAME: Finishing Touches
${ModID}:FinishingTouches.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card, if it's the only one in your hand, play it twice.

${ModID}:FlyingFish.NAME: Flying Fish
${ModID}:FlyingFish.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage for !M! turn. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FlyingFish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage for !M! turns. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Jellyfish.NAME: Jellyfish
${ModID}:Jellyfish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Zapped. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TheWhale.NAME: The Whale
${ModID}:TheWhale.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Swordfish.NAME: Swordfish
${ModID}:Swordfish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AquaOrb.NAME: Aqua Orb
${ModID}:AquaOrb.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Solo: Play the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:FreeDrinks.NAME: Free Drinks
${ModID}:FreeDrinks.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL When you obtain this, obtain a random Potion.

${ModID}:CrystallineConfluence.NAME: Crystal Confluence
${ModID}:CrystallineConfluence.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle X ${ModID}:Foil *Star *Shards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:CrystallineConfluence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle X+1 ${ModID}:Foil *Star *Shards into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FastingB.NAME: Fasting-B
${ModID}:FastingB.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Thorns. NL Draw 1 fewer card each turn.

${ModID}:QuestTimeTheStorm.NAME: The Storm
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheStorm.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, NL gain [E] [E]. NL ${ModID}:Quest: Spend 6 Energy in a turn. NL *Reward: A random enemy loses 17 HP.
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, NL gain [E] [E] [E]. NL ${ModID}:Quest: Spend 6 Energy in a turn. NL *Reward: A random enemy loses 17 HP.

${ModID}:QuestTimeTheLuckyPack.NAME: The Lucky Pack
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheLuckyPack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL ${ModID}:Quest: Play 3 ${ModID}:Foil cards in a row. NL *Reward: Play the last card twice.

${ModID}:QuestTimeTheTerribleTwos.NAME: The Terrible Twos
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheTerribleTwos.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Quest: Play 3 2-cost cards. NL *Reward: Gain 22 Block.

${ModID}:Supernova.NAME: Supernova
${ModID}:Supernova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each ${ModID}:Foil card played this turn.

${ModID}:VexingDeal.NAME: Vexing Deal
${ModID}:VexingDeal.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Exhaust 1 card and draw 1 card.
${ModID}:VexingDeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, Exhaust 1 card and draw 1 card.

${ModID}:TheFinalCard.NAME: The Final Card
${ModID}:TheFinalCard.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Solo: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this ends the combat, Upgrade it.
${ModID}:TheFinalCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Solo: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Thanks for playing.

${ModID}:QuestTimeTheHarpoon.NAME: The Harpoon
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheHarpoon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Startup ${ModID}:Quest: Kill an enemy. NL *Reward: Shuffle *The *Whale into your draw pile.

${ModID}:EndsOfTheEarth.NAME: Ends Of The Earth
${ModID}:EndsOfTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: Can be played from your discard pile. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
${ModID}:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL If you have Block, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:StarShard.NAME: Star Shard
${ModID}:StarShard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card.

${ModID}:QuestTimeThePrismaticPortal.NAME: The Prismatic Portal
${ModID}:QuestTimeThePrismaticPortal.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Quest: Play a Common, Uncommon, Rare, and Special card. NL *Reward: Shuffle *The *Gem *Search into your draw pile.

${ModID}:QuestTimeTheGemSearch.NAME: The Gem Search
${ModID}:QuestTimeTheGemSearch.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Quest: End your turn with an empty hand. NL *Reward: Shuffle *The *Eternity *Gem into your draw pile.

${ModID}:TheEternityGem.NAME: The Eternity Gem
${ModID}:TheEternityGem.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShinyShots.NAME: Shiny Shots
${ModID}:ShinyShots.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Gain !B! Block for each ${ModID}:Foil card in your hand.

${ModID}:PerfectPull.NAME: Perfect Pull
${ModID}:PerfectPull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a ${ModID}:Foil card, repeat this.

${ModID}:ShimmeringShank.NAME: Shimmering Shank
${ModID}:ShimmeringShank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a ${ModID}:Foil card this turn, add a *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:MaybeLater.NAME: Maybe Later
${ModID}:MaybeLater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL If you do, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:MintCondition.NAME: Mint Condition
${ModID}:MintCondition.DESCRIPTION: The second time you play a ${ModID}:Foil card each turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:TheBackpack.NAME: The Backpack
${ModID}:TheBackpack.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Put a ${ModID}:Foil card from your draw or discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:TheBackpack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Put a ${ModID}:Foil card from your draw or discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:PyramidClimber.NAME: Pyramid Climb
${ModID}:PyramidClimber.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for every 6 cards in your discard pile.
